SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin
, BB.ChannelName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMChannel BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
, BB.ChannelName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMChannel BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID

, ChannelID = #ChannelID# , BrandID = #BrandID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , ChannelMargin = #ChannelMargin# , BrandMargin = #BrandMargin# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#

, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = #StartDate#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND BrandID = #BrandID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MIN(StartDate) FROM dbo.BMChannelBrand WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND BrandID = #BrandID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
